context.title: Data Tools ODA contexts
context.description: Contexts for items identified by Actuate, 2006-12-13

context.title: New XML File Data Source Profile
context.description: Use this dialog box to define an XML file data source.

context.title: New Flat File Data Source Profile
context.description: Use this dialog box to define the profile for a new flat file

context.title: Select Table - Select Columns
context.description: Use this dialog box to select columns for the data set.

context.title: DTP XML DataSet
context.description: Use this dialog box to specify a sample XML source for data preview.

context.title: Table Mapping
context.description: Use this dialog box to map a table.

context.title: Select or edit the XPath expression
context.description: Use this dialog box to specify the XPath expression to be used.

context.title: Column Mapping
context.description: Use this page to map XML elements to columns.

context.title: Column Mapping
context.description: Use this dialog box to map a column to an XPath expression.

context.title: Preferences - XML Data Set
context.description: Use this dialog box to set preferences for XML data sets.
